name: Barkeeper
message: Hmmm... if you dont have any money get out of here

name: Barkeeper
message: It's nothing personal but in this place people are a smarty-pants when it comes to pay for something

name: Traveler
message: I see... I'll be back later

name: Barkeeper
message: Ok, but don't forget to bring some money with you

name: Barkeeper
message: So, you want something to drink?
